content.p: The PHP Rio User Group is pleased to announce their second edition of the PHP'n Rio conference. It will be held on November 20th, 2010, at the PUC Rio university, Rio de Janeiro. It is a one day conference aimed on providing experienced developers and beginners a chance to learn more about PHP frameworks, web applications built in PHP, and the art of testing code.
No fees or subscription required. Participation is entirely free!

Whether you live here or are around just enjoying the marvelous city, come and join us :) For more information, please visit
http://www.phprio.org/phpnrio10
(Portuguese only).
